success.title: Registration Complete
success.body: Version has been registered. You can launch from system apps list.

failed.title: Registration Failed
failed.body: An error occurred during registration. Please retry or check environment.

gdk_missing.title: Microsoft GDK Missing
gdk_missing.body: GDK toolkit not detected. Registration requires installation. Open Settings to install?

complete.title: Delete Complete
complete.content: The selected version has been deleted successfully!

confirm.title: Confirm Delete
confirm.content: Are you sure you want to delete this version? This operation cannot be undone.

failed.title: Launch Error
failed.content: You did not select any version, please go to the download page to download it!

completing.title: Completing missing DLL
completing.body: Downloading and completing vcruntime140_1.dll, please wait…

loading.title: Launching Minecraft
loading.body: Waiting for the game window to appear, please wait…

success.title: Shortcut Created
success.body: A desktop shortcut for this version has been created.

installing.title: Installing GameInput
installing.body: Downloading and starting the installer. Follow system prompts to complete.

missing.title: GameInput Component Missing
missing.body: Microsoft GameInput is required to run the game. Install now?

missing.title: Microsoft Gaming Services Missing
missing.body: Microsoft Gaming Services was not detected. This dependency is required for Minecraft.

install_confirm.title: Installation Completed?
install_confirm.body: After finishing installation, click 'Done, Recheck'. Otherwise continue installing.

tip.general: Tip: First launch may be slow. Please wait.
tip.choose_version_dropdown: Use the dropdown on the right to switch versions quickly.
tip.open_version_settings_gear: Hover the Current Version badge and click the gear in the tooltip to open Version Settings; supports icon customization and isolation.
tip.mods_import_button: Use the “Import .zip/.dll” button on the Mods card to pick files.
tip.download_versions: Install Release/Preview on the Download page; it appears in the dropdown afterward.
tip.content_counts_card: The Content card shows counts of worlds, resource and behavior packs.
tip.file_manager_pick: File Manager supports multi-select and returns paths to Mods import.
tip.settings_base_root: Settings lets you change the content base path; default %APPDATA%\<current executable name>.
tip.directory_write_check: Save only to writable directories; non-writable directories are disabled.

updating.title: Updating LeviLauncher
updating.body: Requesting administrator permission and performing update. Do not close this window during update.

install_folder.enable_isolation_desc: Redirect game data (worlds, settings, caches, etc.) to versions/<name>/ instead of storing in AppData.
install_folder.inherit_hint: Copy data from an isolated version with matching type

mirror.title: Select Download Mirror
mirror.no_mirrors: No mirrors available for this version.

install.hint: Please wait, this process may take a while…

custom_installer.label: Choose local installer (.msixvc)
custom_installer.hint: Defaults to using files in the installers directory

unsaved.title: Unsaved Changes
unsaved.body: You changed the content path but haven't saved it. Save and leave?

discord_rpc.title: Discord Rich Presence
discord_rpc.desc: Show your game status on Discord

confirm.title: Restore default path?
confirm.body: This will reset the content path to the default location. Are you sure?

license.title: License Agreement
license.body: You must accept the terms of the Microsoft Public Game Development Kit License Agreement to continue.
license.accept: I accept the terms in the License Agreement.

install.title: Installing GDK
install.body: Please wait while the installer runs…

about.author: Author
about.thanks.desc: Special thanks to individuals and projects supporting LeviLauncher.
about.sponsors.desc: Thanks to all sponsors and supporters for the project's development!
about.contribute.desc: Contributions via Issues or Pull Requests are welcome to improve LeviLauncher.
about.license.tip: See LICENSE in the repository for license details.

contentpage.require_player_for_world_import: Select a player before importing a world (.mcworld)
contentpage.select_player_for_import: Please select the player to import to
contentpage.delete_pack_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete {{name}}?
contentpage.delete_selected_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete the selected {{count}} items?
contentpage.delete_world_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete world {{name}}?

edit.title: Version Settings
edit.hint: Only rename the folder. Game version and type are unaffected.
edit.delete_hint: Click to open delete confirmation to avoid accidental deletion.
edit.unregister_hint: This version is registered to system. Only unregister is allowed; then you can rename or delete.

unregister_success.title: Unregister Successful
unregister_success.body: Successfully unregistered. You can now delete this version.

logo.title: Custom Icon (square required)
logo.hint: Will be saved as LargeLogo.png under the version folder. Click the icon to change.

unsaved.body: You have unsaved changes to version settings. Do you want to save before leaving?

errors.ERR_GAME_ALREADY_RUNNING: Detected the current version of Minecraft is already running. Please close it before launching or switch to another version.
errors.ERR_NAME_TRAILING_DOT_SPACE: Name cannot end with a dot or space
errors.ERR_NAME_RESERVED: Name is a Windows reserved word
errors.ERR_RENAME_FAILED: Rename failed, possibly in use or no permission
errors.ERR_MC_NOT_AUTHORIZED: Please ensure you own the legitimate {{typeLabel}} Minecraft license. Sign in with an account that owns the product or purchase it and retry.
errors.ERR_DELETE_FAILED: Delete failed, possibly in use or permission denied
errors.ERR_NO_GAME_DATA: No game data found for the selected source
errors.ERR_VCRUNTIME_MISSING: Runtime dependency missing. Please install Microsoft Visual C++ Runtime and retry
errors.ERR_DEV_MODE_REQUIRED: Developer Mode is not enabled, and auto-enable failed. Please enable Developer Mode manually and retry.

filemanager.dir_not_writable: Directory not writable. Please choose another location

mods.importing_body: Please wait while processing selected files.
mods.confirm_delete_body: Are you sure you want to delete this {{type}}? This action cannot be undone.
mods.err_duplicate_folder: Module folder with same name exists
mods.overwrite_modal_body: A module folder with the same name exists. Overwrite (update)?
mods.toggle_desc_on: Mod is enabled and will load when the game starts.
mods.toggle_desc_off: Mod is disabled and will not load when the game starts.

unsaved.title: Unsaved Changes
unsaved.body: You changed the selected version but haven't saved yet. Save and leave?

terms.title: LeviLauncher License Agreement
terms.body:
Welcome to LeviLauncher

By using this software, you agree that:
• This is an unofficial Minecraft launcher
• You must own a legally licensed copy of Minecraft, otherwise the trial mode will be used automatically
• Any form of piracy or cheating is prohibited
• Use of mods/resource packs is at your own risk
• No affiliation with Mojang/Microsoft

Continuing to use indicates acceptance of the terms

onboarding.title: Welcome
onboarding.subtitle: Please configure content paths and language

unsaved.title: Unsaved Changes
unsaved.body: You have unsaved changes to the content path. Save before finishing?

curseforge.title: CurseForge
curseforge.load_error: Failed to load data, please retry

install.select_version_body: Please select the game version to import to:
